showerReviews.reviewText: Nice park with shower.  Has a kids playground and is easily assessable from the beach.
Amazing Beach. There is a good restroom, outdoor shower, playground for kids, beach toys, and huge parking space. There are also some walk by restaurants. Love it. ü§ç ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ the walk to the water includes some chunky shells but it‚Äôs definitely worth it. Coming around 8am is well worth it. Restrooms were clean, I was able to go to the beach, rinse off in the outdoor shower and change before heading back to NC!
Very nice place. The restrooms were clean. The shower outside was working to wash your feet. Your hair whatever after being in the ocean highly recommend the park

‚Ä¶ and drink right on the beach within the resturant premises. There is a kid playground and washroom too. There is a shower to cleanup sands after you finishing your beach activity. I would highly recommend this park for your family time.
Beautiful!! Easy beach access; handicap/wheelchair/stroller accessible. Playgrounds, picnic areas, clean restrioms, shower area, PuttPutt.
Parking very close, restroom facilities clean, shower off sand right there also... Very enjoyable experience.

‚Ä¶ the beach and parks! I was amazed that they were changing the green on the putt putt golf area! It looked great before and now it is brand new! You can tell they take pride in main beach. The park, bathroooms, and shower areas are nice!
Beautiful, clean, and kept. Convenient beach access with restrooms and a shower area.

Very beautiful and clean.
There is a spot to borrow beach toys & a great shower area. Great beach access. Parking was a breeze and there are many shops you can walk to quickly.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ Park is conveniently located on Sadler Road where it meets the ocean. Our favorite ocean access point. Always clean and it even has an outdoor shower. Nice to be able to wash some of the sand off before getting back inside your vehicle.

My favorite and convenient place on the beach. There are tables, foot shower and toilets. You can see rabbits here. The parking lot is full on hot days, but I have managed to park somehow so farüòÅ. There is V pizza, a bar and a souvenir shop ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ that features live music. Walking, swimming, surfing, fishing, beach tailgaiting. The swim flag is usually, "yellow". Open 24/7, just can't park there from midnight to 5am. Bathrooms are open! Outdoor shower. Frequent dolphin sightings.
Restrooms are closed at sunset, ample parking, traffic circle so no traffic backup when leaving, rinse off open air shower at parking lot, and the OCEAN! Beach is clean and relaxing.
Good parking, nice beach access, shower, just know it is right next to vehicle beach access, so if you don't want to be around cars you might need to walk a bit more.
Pet friendly, on-leash. Bathrooms. Shower stations. Picnic tables. Trash cans. Food/drink nearby. Beach shop nearby. Very nice.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ of a cane. Overall I would definitely come back, it's worth the drive for a fun get away. Just one set back, the shower system outside the bathroom does not work so we were not able to wash off the sand before returning to our vehicles.

‚Ä¶ my first visit to this park and definitely not my last. This park was amazing, had beautifully clean stretches of beach, and a unique indoor restroom shower facility. With the playground very close to the showers and the parking lot ‚Ä¶
One of the best beaches on the North Florida Atlantic side. Plenty of parking, restroom and shower amenities and it's never too crowded.
They have bathrooms and shower spaces. Could be cleaned better though. Beach was OK, a little rough sand with shells but once you get out past them it is sandy.

‚Ä¶ Clean, white sand beach with shells galore! Not crowded, even in June!  Has a shower and restroom that is clean as well. Plenty of FREE parking. The lifeguard was super nice and was a plethora of information about the gopher turtle we saw!
This beach is family friendly. Large and very quiet. Nice shower facilities after a day on the beach.

‚Ä¶ and this place was awesome! Tons of parking (free), sand was soft and water was bit rough and murky. Was cool to see people park on beach like the old days; don't see that on gulf side. Lifeguards on duty as well as shower after beach.
Great beach with a nice wooden walkway to the beach from the parking lot. Also there are bathrooms and an outdoor shower.
Our family loves American Beach! Always plenty if parking,  short walk to the beach and the bathroom is decent.  There is also an outdoor shower to rinse off before jumping into your vehicle.

‚Ä¶ comfortably spaced out with the surge in Covid numbers. I didn't go in the women's bathroom but my hubs says the man's bathroom was very clean and the shower had good water pressure. This beach is kid and pet friendly. We will definitely ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: The pool was delightful during the family swim time. The life guards near the office help with our needs. The changing rooms, lockers, and shower/restrooms make it easy to take my grandson.

‚Ä¶ love the child care staff. My son does not do well at any other child care place, but here they know how to handle him so we can work out together.  Not impressed with the family shower rooms. No privacy.  Not impressed with the work out ‚Ä¶

Overcrowded locker rooms.  They never clean the shower areas.  The building is less than 3 years old, but they will not fix the several shower nozzles that are broken.  Management will not limit the membership, so you can be assured of not ‚Ä¶

This facility has handicap accessible shower stalls which has been a godsend for mom post knee replacement. We have just added the pool to her therapy routine.b Everyone has been very helpful and considerate.

‚Ä¶ for those with allergies to it like myself). Why is the music turned up so loud in the pool? And a few of the members sprayed a ton of perfume after a shower. For anyone with trauma or over stimulation issues it could cause problems. ‚Ä¶

The men‚Äôs restroom should be cleaned and sanitized properly. For the last two weeks I have seen debris, hair, mold on the shower floors walls benches  and soap dispensers. However the cleaning staff spend a decent amount of time for offices ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ ..And yes shower room smells urine and hair strands left in the drain holes I've noticed and complained about that before and never used again since.But I like the place, the view is awesome, staff yes they're friendly and quick to help. I ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ ), why the heck aren‚Äôt these people at work?! No problem, got a workout in and went to the shower area stopped at the steam room and it was broken and NO way was I gonna take a shower there, the place is NASTY!  Yuck, yuck,yuck. STRKE TWO! ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ 1. MAKE SURE YOU FORCE PEOPLE TO TAKE A SHOWER BEFORE HEAD TO SWIMMING POOL. ‚Ä¶

My favorite and convenient place on the beach. There are tables, foot shower and toilets. You can see rabbits here. The parking lot is full on hot days, but I have managed to park somehow so farüòÅ. There is V pizza, a bar and a souvenir shop ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ that features live music. Walking, swimming, surfing, fishing, beach tailgaiting. The swim flag is usually, "yellow". Open 24/7, just can't park there from midnight to 5am. Bathrooms are open! Outdoor shower. Frequent dolphin sightings.
Restrooms are closed at sunset, ample parking, traffic circle so no traffic backup when leaving, rinse off open air shower at parking lot, and the OCEAN! Beach is clean and relaxing.
